_header: I heard an harping on a hill as I lay under lind
_description: A chanson d’aventure song of the Passion with symbolic letters — six 6-line stanzas with ‘O and I’ refrain

BodDonC13.First Lines:
I herd an harping on a hille as I lay vndir lyndeAl my tent I toke
                    þer tille to haue þat myrth in mynde…
BodDonC13.Last Lines:
…With an o & an i haue X and M in myndeþus hendely I
                    herd an harping as I lay vndir lynde
